name: VAIA Market Data Fetcher
description: VAIA Market Data Fetcher which gets data from hotel websites and stores it in the database

scripts.dev:scrape: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNIT_TEST=true UNIT_TEST_MODULE=scrape node index.js
scripts.dev:ai: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNIT_TEST=true UNIT_TEST_MODULE=ai node index.js
scripts.dev:ai:extract: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNIT_TEST=true UNIT_TEST_MODULE=ai UNIT_TEST_ACTION=extract node index.js
scripts.dev:ai:after_extract: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNIT_TEST=true UNIT_TEST_MODULE=ai UNIT_TEST_ACTION=after_extract node index.js
